text: ād samudāyattinu śēṣaṁ avan niṅṅaḷe pingāmikaḷākkukayuṁ, niṅṅaḷkkavan bhūmiyil vāsasthalaṁ orukkittarikayuṁ ceyta sandarbhaṁ niṅṅaḷ ōrkkukayuṁ ceyyuka. atile samatalaṅṅaḷil niṅṅaḷ sedhaṅṅaḷuṇṭākkunnu. malakaḷ veṭṭiyeṭutt niṅṅaḷ vīṭukaḷuṇṭākkukayuṁ ceyyunnu. aṅṅane allāhuvinṟe anugrahaṅṅaḷ niṅṅaḷ ōrtt nēākkuka. niṅṅaḷ nāśakārikaḷāyikkeāṇṭ bhūmiyil kuḻappaṁ sr̥ṣṭikkarut‌
